name: Slimy World
description:
This is a prototype of a platformer made by middle school students in one year. They have worked on it one hour each week. This prototype will have some updates to correct bugs or add levels.

You play a slime who seek an artefact in a cave to stop the apocalypse.

Keyboard:
Left / Right : A/D or Q/D or ←/→ 

Jump : Space or ↑

Restart : R

Quit/Menu : Escape

Controller:

Jump : B Nitendo / A Xbox / X PlayStation

Restart : Select

Quit/Menu : Start
